snippet.title: Zombie Tower Survivor – Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Zombie Tower Survivor is a top-down, tower-defense game with survival elements set during a zombie apocalypse. 

Customize a magic tower with various talents and upgrades to fend off the undead. As the zombie waves grow stronger, refine your defensive strategies and adapt to the increasing challenges.

Test your strategy to keep your tower alive!

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2934480/Zombie_Tower_Survivor/
Play the early demo on itch.io: https://alexsloth.itch.io/zombie-tower-survivor
Join our Discord: https://discord.gg/YDUNFPsy4r
Press Kit: https://zombietowersurvivor.com/press-kit/

▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬▬
